name: Agriculture 4.0 & Industries 4.0 2020
content: Agriculture 4.0 is set to provide an interactive platform to discuss the opportunities offered by disruptive digital technologies to increase productivity, and access to services and markets in the agricultural sector. Industries 4.0 is set to provide an interactive platform to discuss the opportunities offered by disruptive digital technologies to increase productivity, and access to services and markets in manufacturing and supply chain management.
